test/fixtures/type-error/noOverload.ro
    1│ type i32
    2│ type f32
    3│ 
    4│ private fun x(): i32 = 1
    5│ private fun x(a: i32): i32 = 1
    6│ 
    7│ fun test(a: f32): i32 = x(a)
     │                         ^ Could not find a valid overload for function of type fun() -> i32 & fun(a: i32) -> i32 with the arguments of type (f32)
     │                   ^^^ Type mismatch: Type "INVALID_TYPE" is not assignable to "i32"
    8│
